name: TSAR BOMBA
name2: TSAR BOMBA Watch for Men, 50M Waterproof Automatic Mens Watch, Skeleton Mechanical Tonneau Big Face Dial Black Watch with Silicone Watch Bands, Gifts for Men
description1: [TSAR BOMBA-Mechanical Temptation] The TSAR BOMBA men's watch adopts a novel double-arch bridge tonneau-shaped case design combined with a mechanical skeleton design, which fits the wrist very well and has a fashion sense. The mirror is made of artificial sapphire glass, which fits perfectly with the 316L stainless steel case. At the same time, the A-level luminous function also allows you to see the time at night without hurting your eyes.
description2: [Waterproof 50M (164FT)] Suitable for short-term recreational swimming, showering and rain splashing, but not suitable for long-term diving or snorkeling. Be careful not to get into the hot water! Excessive temperature difference will cause the waterproof rubber ring to expand the gap when the temperature drops, causing water to enter the watch.
description3: [Adjustable Strap - Silicone Watch Bands] Silicone strap length is about 22cm (8.66in), width is about 2cm (0.78in). It is waterproof and sweatproof, comfortable and breathable, resistant to wear and tear, and anti-allergic. The TSAR BOMBA strap is also available in a variety of colors.
description4: [Japanese Movement + IP Plasma Plating] Absolute quality automatic mechanical movement, stable operation, accurate recording, reminding you to use every minute and every second efficiently.The case is IP plasma plated, which is not easy to fade and has a long-lasting bright color.
description5: [Authentic Guarantee, Two-Year Warranty] TSAR BOMBA is committed to providing customers with high-quality products and 100% service, with a 2-year warranty. Whether it's Christmas, Thanksgiving, Father's Day or birthdays, anniversaries, weddings or any business casual occasion, this authentic men's watch will surprise you! If you have any questions, please feel free to email us via Amazon (click the store name at the bottom of the cart) and we will respond to your message within 24 hours.
